title: Smart Data Models - PFVArControllerType2Dynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Power Factor or VAr controller Type II function block whose behaviour is described by reference to a standard model

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PFVArControllerType2Dynamics

ExcitationSystemDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation system model with which this Power Factor or VAr controller Type II is associated. Default: None
